metadata.title: CVE-2018-5134 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
WebExtensions may use "view-source:" URLs to view local "file:" URLcontent, as well as content stored in "about:cache", bypassing restrictionsthat only allow WebExtensions to view specific content. This vulnerabilityaffects Firefox < 59.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-5134` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 59.0.1+build1-0ubuntu1
firefox-globalmenu - 59.0.1+build1-0ubuntu1
firefox-mozsymbols - 59.0.1+build1-0ubuntu1
firefox-testsuite - 59.0.1+build1-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '59.0.1+build1-0ubuntu1').
